title: Two paths.
description: Follow the same drop through a traditional tool versus Clipposaurus and see where your data actually ends up.

comparisonPoints.label: Content is visible to providers
comparisonPoints.description: Admins and retention systems can open or scan what you send.

comparisonPoints.label: Copies linger everywhere
comparisonPoints.description: Backups, sync, and logs create artifacts you can't easily clean up.

comparisonPoints.label: Control ends once sent
comparisonPoints.description: No remote delete or guaranteed expiration after delivery.

comparisonPoints.label: Sealed with zero-knowledge keys
comparisonPoints.description: Only sender and recipient can decrypt â€” not Clipposaurus, not storage.

comparisonPoints.label: Auto-erase after delivery
comparisonPoints.description: Expiration wipes the payload and keys to remove residue.

comparisonPoints.label: Single encrypted path
comparisonPoints.description: No redundant copies or backup trails outside the intended recipient.

ctaHelper: No account required to try it.
